definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
erhua variant of 回單|回单[hui2 dan1]

sentences.english: Bank return receipt to cashier, and attach it with the AP voucher.
sentences.chinese: 出納收到銀行退回的回單，並粘貼於憑證後。

sentences.english: After receiving packing list that client signed and stamped, check them and give to project manager.
sentences.chinese: 收到客戶簽收的回單後，覈對後交給項目主管。

sentences.english: Your quick answer will be highly appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 你的迅速回單，我將不勝感激。

sentences.english: Please deposit your payment into any of the following accounts, and fax the bank slip to us.
sentences.chinese: 付款請匯入以下任一帳號，再將銀行回單傳真給我們。

sentences.english: The design and realization of the Bill Management of Bank Software are described mainly in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要論述了銀行回單管理軟件的設計與實現。

sentences.english: Your business has been finished. please bring your receipt.
sentences.chinese: 您的業務已經辦好了，請拿好您的回單。
